text:
I have a zoom mtg I have to take from my place Thurs at noon. I also am away in the morning on Thurs starting around 9:15 for another mtg. If you can come between 9:15 am and be gone by 11:50 amâ€¦ I guess I can leave the place unlocked for you. But it means I would not see you! â˜¹ï¸
(I was counting on seeing you in person and marking the special occassion of you finishing your 25 work sessions. But I guess that isnâ€™t really necessary - so, if you can come between 9:15 and 11:50, then I guess, sure, okay for Thurs.
Please confirm. ğŸ‘
